titleStmt.title: Two prayers one for the safety of His Majesties person : the other for the preservation of this university and city of Oxford : to be used in all churches and chappells.
titleStmt.author: Duppa, Brian, 1588-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, Printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Brian Duppa.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
